name: Meltdown Runner
description:
Meltdown Runner

Run like hell to survive as long as you can while a sifi power plant of the future incinerates in nuclear fire all around you! HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!

Tap, click or use any key to jump and double jump

*

*

*

This is my first game!

I built it with Phaser 3.  This is a  mod of  the game from the infinite runner tutorial by Emanuele Feronato on Phaser
